amendment.description: Amendment specifies the amount for operations of the Federal Aviation Administration that is to be derived from the Airport and Airway Trust Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to insert on page 6 of the bill "of which $4,972,000,000 shall be derived from the Airport and Airway Trust Fund" after "$7,726,000,000".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Istook.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Istook amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
